sections.text: anuvAkam - 1

paqrEqyuqvA(gm)sa#m praqvatO# maqhIranu# baqhuByaqH panthA#manapaspaSAqnam | vaiqvaqsvaqta(gm) saq~ggama#naqm janA#nAm ~Myaqma(gm) rAjA#na(gm) haqviShA# duvasyata || iqdam tvAq vastra#m prathaqmaM nvAgaqnnapaiqtadU#haq yadiqhAbi#BaH puqrA | iqShTAqpUqrtamanuq saMpa#Syaq dakShi#NAqm ~MyathA# tE daqttam ba#huqdhA vi ba#ndhuShu || iqmau yu#najmi tE vaqhnI asu#nIthAya vOqDhavE$ | yAByA$m ~Myaqmasyaq sAda#na(gm) suqkRutAqm cApi# gacCatAt || pUqShA tvEqtaScyA#vayatuq praviqdvA-nana#ShTapaSuqr-Buva#nasya gOqpAH | sa tvaiqtEByaqH pari#dadAt piqtRuByOq&gnirdEqvEBya#H suviqdatrE$ByaH || pUqShEmA ASAq anu#vEdaq sarvAqH sO aqsmA(gm) aBa#yatamEna nEShat | svaqstiqdA aGRu#NiqH sarva#vIqrO-&pra#yucCanpuqra E#tuq praviqdvAn || 1 (10)

Ayu#r-viqSvAyuqH pari#pAsati tvA pUqShA tvA# pAtuq prapa#thE puqrastA$t | yatrAsa#tE suqkRutOq yatraq tE yaqyustatra# tvA dEqvaH sa#viqtA da#dhAtu || Buva#nasya pata iqda(gm) haqviH || aqgnayE# rayiqmatEq svAhA$ || puru#Shasya sayAvaqryapEdaqGAni# mRujmahE | yathA# nOq atraq nApa#raH puqrA jaqrasaq Aya#ti || puru#Shasya sayAvariq vi tE$ prAqNama#si srasam | SarI#rENa maqhImihi# svaqdhayEhi# piqtRUnupa# praqjayAq&smAniqhAva#ha || maiva#m mAq(gg)qstA pri#yEq&ham dEqvI saqtI pi#tRulOqkam ~MyadaiShi# | viqSvavA#rAq naBa#sAq sam~Mvya#yantyuqBau nO# lOqkau paya#sAq&ByAva#vRuthsva || 2 (10)

iqyam nArI# patilOqkam ~MvRu#NAqnA nipa#dyataq upa# tvA martyaq prEta$m | viSva#m purAqNamanu# pAqlaya#ntIq tasyai$ praqjAm dravi#Nam cEqha dhE#hi || udI$rShva nAryaqBi jI#valOqkamiqtAsu#mEqtamupa#SEShaq Ehi# | haqstaqgrAqBasya# didhiqShOstvamEqtat patyu#rjaniqtvamaqBi saMba#BUva || suqvarNaq(gm)q hastA#dAqdadA#nA mRuqtasya# Sriqyai brahma#NEq tEja#sEq balA#ya | atraiqva tvamiqha vaqya(gm) suqSEvAq viSvAqH spRudhO# aqBimA#tIrjayEma || dhanuqrq. hastA#dAqdadA#nA mRuqtasya# Sriqyai kShaqtrAyauja#sEq balA#ya | atraiqva tvamiqha vaqya(gm) suqSEvAq viSvAqH spRudhO# aqBimA#tIrjayEma | maNiq(gm)q hastA#dAqdadA#nA mRuqtasya# Sriqyai viqSE puShTyaiq balA#ya | atraiqva tvamiqha vaqya(gm) suqSEvAq viSvAqH spRudhO# aqBimA#tIrjayEma || 3 (10)

iqmama#gnE camaqsam mA vijI$hvaraH priqyO dEqvAnA#muqta sOqmyAnA$m | EqSha yaSca#maqsO dE#vaqpAnaqstasmi#n dEqvA aqmRutA# mAdayantAm || aqgnErvarmaq pariq gOBi#rvyayasvaq saMprOrNu#Shvaq mEda#sAq pIva#sA ca | nEttvA# dhRuqShNur. hara#sAq jar.hRu#ShANOq dadha#d-vidhaqkShyan-paryaq~gKayA#tai || maina#magnEq vida#hOq mA&BiSO#cOq mA&syaq tvaca#m cikShipOq mA SarI#ram | yaqdA SRuqtam kaqravO# jAtavEqdO&thE#mEnaqm prahi#NutAt piqtRuBya#H || SRuqtam ~MyaqdA kaqrasi# jAtavEqdO&thE#mEnaqm pari#dattAt piqtRuBya#H | yaqdA gacCAqtyasu#nItimEqtAmathA# dEqvAnA$m ~MvaSaqnIrBa#vAti || sUrya#m tEq cakShu#r-gacCatuq vAta#mAqtmA dyAm caq gacCa# pRuthiqvIm caq dharma#NA | aqpO vA# gacCaq yadiq tatra# tE hiqtamOSha#dhIShuq prati#tiShThAq SarI#raiH ( ) || aqjO BAqgastapa#sAq tam ta#pasvaq tam tE# SOqcista#patuq tam tE# aqrciH | yAstE# SiqvAstaqnuvO# jAtavEdaqstABi#r-vahEqma(gm) suqkRutAqm ~Myatra# lOqkAH || aqyam ~Mvai tvamaqsmAdadhiq tvamEqtadaqyam ~Mvai tada#syaq yOni#rasi | vaiqSvAqnaqraH puqtraH piqtrE lO#kaqkRu-jjA#tavEdOq vahE#ma(gm) suqkRutAqm ~Myatra# lOqkAH || 4 (14)
anuvAkam - 2

ya Eqtasya# paqthO gOqptAraqstEByaqH svAhAq ya Eqtasya# paqthO ra#kShiqtAraqstEByaqH svAhAq ya Eqtasya# paqthO#&Bira#kShiqtAraqstEByaqH svAhA$&&KyAqtrE svAhA#&pAKyAqtrE svAhA#&BiqlAla#patEq svAhA#&paqlAla#patEq svAhAq&gnayE# karmaqkRutEq svAhAq yamatraq nAdhIqmastasmaiq svAhA$ || yasta# iqddhmam jaqBara#th siShvidAqnO mUqrddhAna#m ~MvA taqtapa#tE tvAqyA | divOq viSva#smAth sImaGAyaqta u#ruShyaH || aqsmAttvamadhi# jAqtO#&siq tvadaqyam jA#yatAqm puna#H | aqgnayE# vaiSvAnaqrAya# suvaqrgAya# lOqkAyaq svAhA$ || 5 (5)
anuvAkam - 3

pra kEqtunA# bRuhaqtA BA$tyaqgnirAqvir-viSvA#ni vRuShaqBO rO#ravIti | diqvaSciqdantAqdupaq mAmuqdAna#DaqpAmuqpasthE# mahiqShO va#varddha || iqdaMtaq Eka#m paqra U#taq Eka#m tRuqtIyE#naq jyOti#ShAq sam~Mvi#Sasva | saqm~MvESa#nastaqnuvaiq cAru#rEdhi priqyO dEqvAnA$m paraqmE saqdhasthE$ || nAkE# supaqrNamupaq yat pata#nta(gm) hRuqdA vEna#ntO aqByaca#kShata tvA | hira#NyapakShaqm ~Mvaru#Nasya dUqtam ~Myaqmasyaq yOnau# Sakuqnam Bu#raqNyum || ati#drava sAramEqyau SvAnau# caturaqkShau Saqbalau# sAqdhunA# paqthA | athA# piqtRUnth su#viqdatrAq(gm)q apI#hi yaqmEnaq yE sa#dhaqmAdaqm mada#nti || yau tEq SvAnau# yama rakShiqtArau# caturaqkShau pa#thiqrakShI# nRuqcakSha#sA | tAByA(gm)# rAjaqn pari# dEhyEna(gg) svaqsti cA$smA anamIqvam ca# dhEhi || 6 (10)

uqruqNaqsA-va#suqtRupA#-vulumbaqlau yaqmasya# dUqtau ca#ratOq vaSAq(gm)q anu# | tAvaqsmaBya#m dRuqSayEq sUryA#yaq puna#rdat tAqvasu#maqdyEha Baqdram || sOmaq EkE$ByaH pavatE GRuqtamEkaq upA#satE | yEByOq madhu# praqdhAva#tiq tA(gg)-Sci#dEqvApi#gacCatAt || yE yuddhya#ntE praqdhanE#Shuq SUrA#sOq yE ta#nuqtyaja#H | yE vA# saqhasra#dakShiNAqstA(gg) Sci#dEqvApi#gacCatAt || tapa#sAq yE a#nAdhRuqShyA-stapa#sAq yE suva#rgaqtAH | tapOq yE ca#kriqrE maqhat tA(gg)-Sci#dEqvApi#gacCatAt || aSma#nvatI rEvatIqH sa(gm)ra#Baddhvaq-mutti#ShThataq prata#ratA saKAyaH | atrA# jahAmaq yE asaqnnaSE#vAH SiqvAn. vaqyamaqBi vAjAqnutta#rEma || 7 (10)

yadvai dEqvasya# saviqtuH paqvitra(gm)# saqhasra#dhAraqm ~Mvita#tamaqntari#kShE | yEnApu#nAqdindraqmanA$rtaq-mArtyaiq tEnAqham mA(gm) saqrvata#num punAmi || yA rAqShTrAt paqnnAdapaq yantiq SAKA# aqBimRu#tA nRuqpati#miqcCamA#nAH | dhAqtustAH sarvAqH pava#nEna pUqtAH praqjayAq&smAn-raqyyA varca#sAq sa(gm)sRu#jAtha || udvaqyam tama#saqspariq paSya#ntOq jyOtiqrutta#ram | dEqvam dE#vaqtrA sUryaqmaga#nmaq jyOti#ruttaqmam || dhAqtA pu#nAtu saviqtA pu#nAtu | aqgnEstEja#sAq sUrya#syaq varca#sA || 8 (8)
anuvAkam - 4

yam tE# aqgnimama#nthAma vRuShaqBAyE#vaq pakta#vE | iqmam ta(gm) Sa#mayAmasi kShIqrENa# cOdaqkEna# ca || yantvama#gnE saqmada#haqstvamuq nirvA#payAq puna#H | kyAqmbUratra# jAyatAm pAkadUqrvA vya#lkaSA || SIti#kEq SIti#kAvatiq hlAdu#kEq hlAdu#kAvati | maqNDUqkyA# susa~ggaqmayEqma(gg) sva#gni(gm) Saqmaya# || Sam tE# dhanvaqnyA ApaqH Samu# tE santvanUqkyA$H | Sam tE# samuqdriyAq ApaqH Samu# tE santuq varShyA$H || Sam tEq srava#ntI-staqnuvEq Samu# tE santuq kUpyA$H | Sam tE# nIhAqrO va#r.Shatuq Samuq pRuShvA&va#SIyatAm || 9 (10)

ava# sRujaq puna#ragnE piqtRuByOq yastaq Ahu#taqScara#ti svaqdhABi#H | AyuqrvasA#naq upa# yAtuq SEShaq(gm)q sa~gga#cCatAm taqnuvA# jAtavEdaH || sa~gga#cCasva piqtRuBiqH sa(gg) svaqdhABiqH sami#ShTApUqrtEna# paraqmE vyO#mann | yatraq BUmyai# vRuqNasEq tatra# gacCaq tatra# tvA dEqvaH sa#viqtA da#dhAtu || yattE# kRuqShNaH Sa#kuqna A#tuqtOda# pipIqlaH saqrpa uqta vAq SvApa#daH | aqgniShTad-viSvA#danRuqNam kRu#NOtuq sOma#Scaq yO brA$hmaqNamA#viqvESa# || uttiqShThAta#-staqnuvaq(gm)q samBa#rasvaq mEha gAtraqmava#hAq mA SarI#ram | yatraq BUmyai# vRuqNasEq tatra# gacCaq tatra# tvA dEqvaH sa#viqtA da#dhAtu || iqdam taq Eka#m paqra U#taq Eka#m tRuqtIyE#naq jyOti#ShAq sam~Mvi#Sasva | saqm~MvESa#na-staqnuvaiq cAru#rEdhi priqyO dEqvAnA$m paraqmE saqdhasthE$ ( ) || utti#ShThaq prEhiq pradraqvauka#H kRuNuShva paraqmE vyO#mann | yaqmEnaq tvam ~MyaqmyA# sam~MvidAqnOt-taqmam nAkaqmadhi# rOhEqmam || "aSma#nvatI rEvatIqr{36}" "yadvai dEqvasya# saviqtuH paqvitraqm{37}" "~MyA rAqShTrAt paqnnA{38}" "dudvaqyam tama#saqspari#{39}" "dhAqtA pu#nAtu{40}" || aqsmAttvamadhi# jAqtO$&syaqyam tvadadhi#jAyatAm | aqgnayE# vaiSvAnaqrAya# suvaqrgAya# lOqkAyaq svAhA$ || 10 (15) (ava#SIyatA(gm) - saqdhasthEq pa~jca# ca) (A4)
anuvAkam - 5

AyA#tu dEqvaH suqmanA#Bi-rUqtiBi#r-yaqmO ha#vEqha praya#tABiraqktA | AsI#datA(gm) supraqyatE#ha baqrq.hiShyUrjA#ya jAqtyai mama# Satruqhatyai$ || yaqmE i#vaq yata#mAnEq yadaitaqm pravA$mBaraqn mAnu#ShA dEvaqyanta#H | AsI#dataq(gg)q svamu# lOqkam ~MvidA#nE svAsaqsthE Ba#vataqminda#vE naH || yaqmAyaq sOma(gm)# sunuta yaqmAya# juhutA haqviH | yaqma(gm) ha# yaqj~jO ga#cCatyaqgnidU#tOq ara#~gkRutaH || yaqmAya# GRuqtava#ddhaqvirjuqhOtaq pra ca# tiShThata | sa nO# dEqvEShvAya#mad-dIqrGamAyuqH pra jIqvasE$ || yaqmAyaq madhu#mattamaq(gm)q rAj~jE# haqvyam ju#hOtana | iqdam namaq RuShi#ByaH pUrvaqjEByaqH pUrvE$ByaH pathiqkRudBya#H || 11 (10)

yO&syaq kauShThyaq jaga#taqH pArthi#vaqsyaika# idvaqSI | yaqmam Ba#~ggyaSraqvO gA#yaq yO rAjA#&napaqrOddhya#H || yaqmam gAya# Ba~ggyaqSravOq yO rAjA#&napaqrOddhya#H | yEnAqpO naqdyO# dhanvA#niq yEnaq dyauH pRu#thiqvI dRuqDhA || hiqraqNyaqkaqkShyAn-thsuqdhurAn#. hiraNyAqkShA-na#yaSSaqPAn | aSvA#-naqnaSya#tO dAqnaqm ~MyaqmO rA#jA&BiqtiShTha#ti || yaqmO dA#dhAra pRuthiqvIM ~MyaqmO viSva#miqdam jaga#t | yaqmAyaq sarvaqmitra#sthEq yat prAqNad-vAqyura#kShiqtam || yathAq pa~jcaq yathAq ShaD yaqthA pa~jca# daqSar.Sha#yaH | yaqmam ~MyO vi#dyAqthsa brU#yAdyaqthaika RuShi#rvijAnaqtE || 12 (10)

trika#drukEBiqH pata#tiq ShaDuqrvI-rEkaqmid-bRuqhat | gAqyaqtrI triqShTupCandA(gm)#siq sarvAq tA yaqma Ahi#tA || aha#rahaqrnaya#mAnOq gAmaSvaqm puru#Shaqm jaga#t | vaiva#svatOq na tRu#pyatiq pa~jca#BiqrmAna#vairyaqmaH || vaiva#svatEq vivi#cyantEq yamEq rAja#ni tE jaqnAH | yE cEqha saqtyEnEcCa#ntEq ya uq cAnRu#tavAdiqnaH || tE rA#janniqha vivi#cyantEq&thA ya#nti tvAqmupa# | dEqvA(gg)Scaq yE na#maqsyantiq brAhma#NA(gg)ScApaqcitya#ti || yasmi#n vRuqkShE su#palAqSE dEqvaiH saqpiMba#tE yaqmaH | atrA# nO viqSpati#H piqtA pu#rAqNA anu#vEnati ( ) || 13 (10)
anuvAkam - 6

vaiqSvAqnaqrE haqviriqdam ju#hOmi sAhaqsra-muthsa(gm)# SaqtadhA#ramEqtam | tasmi#nnEqSha piqtara#m pitAmaqham prapi#tAmaham biBaraqt pinva#mAnE || draqPsaSca#skanda pRuthiqvImanuq dyAmiqma~jcaq yOniqmanuq yaScaq pUrva#H | tRuqtIyaqm ~MyOniqmanu# saq~jcara#ntam draqPsam ju#hOqmyanu# saqpta hOtrA$H || iqma(gm) sa#muqdra(gm) SaqtadhA#raqmuthsa#m ~MvyaqcyamA#naqm Buva#nasyaq maddhyE$ | GRuqtam duhA#nAqmadi#tiqm janAqyAgnEq mA hi(gm)#sIH paraqmE vyO#mann || apE#taq vItaq vi ca# sarpaqtAtOq yE&traq stha pu#rAqNA yE caq nUta#nAH | ahO#BiraqdBi-raqktuBiqr-vya#ktam ~MyaqmO da#dA-tvavaqsAna#masmai || saqviqtaitAniq SarI#rANi pRuthiqvyai mAqturuqpasthaq Ada#dhE | tEBi#r-yujyantA-maGniqyAH || 14 (10)

Suqnam ~MvAqhAH Suqnam nAqrAH Suqnam kRu#Shatuq lA~gga#lam | Suqnam ~Mva#raqtrA ba#ddhyantA(gm) Suqna-maShTrAq-mudi#~ggayaq SunA#sIrA SuqnamaqsmAsu# dhattam || SunA#sIrAviqmAm ~MvAcaqm ~Myad-diqvi ca#kraqthuH paya#H | tEnEqmA-mupa#si~jcatam || sItEq vandA#mahE tvAq&rvAcI# suBagE Bava | yathA# naH suqBagA sa#siq yathA# naH suqPalA sa#si || saqviqtaitAniq SarI#rANi pRuthiqvyai mAqturuqpasthaq Ada#dhE | tEBi#raditEq Sam Ba#va || vimu#cyaddhva-maGniqyA dE#vaqyAnAq atA#riShmaq tama#saspAqramaqsya | jyOti#rApAmaq suva#raganma ( ) || 15 (10)

pra vAtAq vAnti# paqtaya#nti viqdyutaq udOSha#dhIrjihatEq pinva#tEq suva#H | irAq viSva#smaiq Buva#nAya jAyatEq yat paqrjanya#H pRuthiqvI(gm) rEtaqsA&va#ti || yathA# yaqmAya# hAqrmya-mava#paqn pa~jca#mAnaqvAH | Eqvam ~Mva#pAmi hAqrmyam ~MyathA&sA#ma jIvalOqkE BUra#yaH || cita#H stha pariqcita# Urddhvaqcita#H Srayaddhvam piqtarO# dEqvatA$ | praqjApa#tirvaH sAdayatuq tayA# dEqvata#yA || "A pyA#yasvaq{41}" "sam tE${42}" || 16 (7)
anuvAkam - 7

uttE# taBnOmi pRuthiqvIm tvatparIqmam ~MlOqkam niqdadhaqnmO aqha(gm) ri#Sham | EqtA(gg) sthUNA$m piqtarO# dhArayantuq tE&trA# yaqmaH sAda#nAttE minOtu || upa#sarpa mAqtaraqm BUmi#mEqtA-mu#ruqvyaca#sam pRuthiqvI(gm) suqSEvA$m | UrNa#mradA yuvaqtir dakShi#NAvatyEqShA tvA# pAtuq nir.Ru#tyA uqpasthE$ || ucCma#~jcasva pRuthiviq mA vibA#dhithAH sUpAyaqnA&smai# Bava sUpava~jcaqnA | mAqtA puqtram ~MyathA# siqcA&ByE#nam BUmi vRuNu || uqcCma~jca#mAnA pRuthiqvI hi tiShTha#si saqhasraqmmitaq upaq hi Sraya#ntAm | tE gRuqhAsO# madhuqScutOq viSvAhA$smai SaraqNAH saqntvatra# || ENI$rddhAqnA hari#NIqrarju#nIH santu dhEqnava#H | tila#vathsAq Urja#masmaiq duhA#nAq viSvAhA# saqntvana#pasPurantIH || 17 (10)

EqShA tE# yamaqsAda#nE svaqdhA nidhI#yatE gRuqhE | akShi#tiqrnAma# tE asau || iqdam piqtRuByaqH praBa#rEma baqrq.hir dEqvEByOq jIva#ntaq utta#ram BarEma | tattva#mArOqhAsOq mEGyOq Bava#m ~MyaqmEnaq tvam ~MyaqmyA# sam~MvidAqnaH || mA tvA# vRuqkShau saMbA#dhiShTAqm mA mAqtA pRu#thiviq tvam | piqtRUn. hi yatraq gacCAqsyEdhA#sam ~MyamaqrAjyE$ || mA tvA# vRuqkShau saMbA#dhEthAqm mA mAqtA pRu#thiqvI maqhI | vaiqvaqsvaqta(gm) hi gacCA#si yamaqrAjyEq virA#jasi || naqLam plaqvamArO#haiqtam naqLEna# paqthO&nvi#hi | sa tva#m naqLapla#vO BUqtvAq santa#raq prataqrOtta#ra || 18 (10)

saqviqtaitAniq SarI#rANi pRuthiqvyai mAqturuqpasthaq Ada#dhE | tEBya#H pRuthiviq Sam Ba#va || ShaDDhO#tAq sUrya#m tEq cakShu#r gacCatuq vAta#mAqtmA dyAm caq gacCa# pRuthiqvIm caq dharma#NA | aqpO vA# gacCaq yadiq tatra# tE hiqtamOSha#dhIShuq prati#tiShThAq SarI#raiH || para#m mRutyOq anuq parE#hiq panthAqm ~MyastEq sva ita#rO dEvaqyAnA$t | cakShu#ShmatE SRuNvaqtE tE$ bravImiq mA na#H praqjA(gm) rI#riShOq mOta vIqrAn || Sam ~MvAtaqH Sa(gm) hi tEq GRuNiqH Samu# tE saqntvOSha#dhIH | kalpa#ntAm mEq diSa#H SaqgmAH || pRuqthiqvyAstvA# lOqkE sA#dayAmyaqmuShyaq SarmA#si piqtarO# dEqvAtA$ ( ) | praqjApa#tistvA sAdayatuq tayA# dEqvata#yA || aqntari#kShasya tvA diqvastvA# diqSAm tvAq nAka#sya tvA pRuqShThE braqddhnasya# tvA viqShTapE# sAdayAmyaqmuShyaq SarmA#si piqtarO# dEqvatA$ | praqjApa#tistvA sAdayatuq tayA# dEqvata#yA || 19 (12)
anuvAkam - 8

(pagE nO 440) aqpUqpavA$n GRuqtavA(gg)#ScaqrurEha sI#datUttaBnuqvan pRu#thiqvIm dyAmuqtOpari# | yOqniqkRuta#H pathiqkRuta#H saparyataq yE dEqvAnA$m GRuqtaBA#gA iqha stha | EqShA tE yamaqsAda#nE svaqdhA nidhI#yatE gRuqhE#&sau | daSA$kSharAq tA(gm) ra#kShasvaq tAm gO#pAyasvaq tAm tEq pari# dadAmiq tasyA$m tvAq mA da#Ban piqtarO# dEqvatA$ | praqjApa#tistvA sAdayatuq tayA# dEqvata#yA || aqpUqpavA$-~jCRuqtavA$n-kShIqravAqn-dadhi#vAqn-madhu#mA(gg)-ScaqrurEha sI#datUttaBnuqvan-pRu#thiqvIm dyAmuqtOpari# | yOqniqkRuta#H pathiqkRuta#H saparyataq yE dEqvAnA(gm)# SRuqtaBA#gAH kShIqraBA#gAq dadhi#BAgAq madhu#BAgA iqha stha | EqShA tE# yamaqsAda#nE svaqdhA nidhI#yatE gRuqhE#&sau | SaqtAkSha#rA saqhasrA$kSharAq-&yutA$kShaqrA-&cyu#tAkSharAq tA(gm) ra#kShasvaq tAm gO#pAyasvaq tAm tEq pari#dadAmiq tasyA$m tvAq mA da#Ban piqtarO# dEqvatA$ | praqjApa#tistvA sAdayatuq tayA# dEqvata#yA || 20 (10)
anuvAkam - 9

EqtAstE$ svaqdhA aqmRutA$H karOmiq yAstE# dhAqnAH pa#riqkirAqmyatra# | tAstE# yaqmaH piqtRuBi#H sam~MvidAqnO&tra# dhEqnUH kA#maqduGA$H karOtu || tvAmarjuqnauSha#dhInAqm payO$ braqhmANaq idvi#duH | tAsA$m tvAq maddhyAqdAda#dE caqruByOq api#dhAtavE || dUqrvANA(gg)# staqmbamAha#raiqtAm priqyata#mAqm mama# | iqmAm diSa#m manuqShyA#NAqm BUyiqShThA&nuq vi rO#hatu || kASA#nA(gg) staqmbamAha#raq rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyai | ya Eqtasyai# diqSaH paqrABa#vannaGAqyavOq yathAq tE nABa#vAqn puna#H || daqrBANA(gg)# staqmbamAha#ra pitRuqNAmOSha#dhIm priqyAm | anvasyaiq mUla#m jIvAqdanuq kANDaqmathOq Pala$m || 21 (10)

"lOqkam pRu#Naq{43}" "tA a#syaq sUda#dOhasaH{44}" || Sam ~MvAtaqH Sa(gm)hi tEq GRuNiqH Samu# tE saqntvOSha#dhIH | kalpa#ntAm tEq diSaqH sarvA$H || iqdamEqva mEtO&pa#rAqmArti#mArAmaq kA~jcaqna | tathAq tadaqSviByA$m kRuqtam miqtrENaq varu#NEna ca || vaqraqNO vA#rayAdiqdam dEqvO vanaqspati#H | Artyaiq nir.Ru#tyaiq dvEShA$ccaq vanaqspati#H || vidhRu#tirasiq vidhA#rayAqsmadaqGA dvEShA(gm)#si Saqmi SaqmayAqsmadaqGA dvEShA(gm)#si yaqva yaqvayAqsmadaqGA dvEShA(gm)#si || pRuqthiqvIm ga#cCAqntari#kSham gacCaq diva#m gacCaq diSO# gacCaq suva#rgacCaq suva#rgacCaq diSO# gacCaq diva#m gacCAqntari#kSham gacCa pRuthiqvIm ga#cCAqpO vA# gacCaq yadiq tatra# tE hiqtamOSha#dhIShuq prati#tiShThAq SarI#raiH || "aSma#nvatI rEvatIqr{43}" "yadvai dEqvasya# saviqtuH paqvitraqm{44}" "~MyA rAqShTrAtpaqnnA{45}" "dudvaqyam tama#saqspari#{46}" dhAqtA pu#nAtu{47}"( ) || 22 (10)
anuvAkam - 10

ArO#haqtAyu#r-jaqrasa#m gRuNAqnA a#nupUqrvam ~Myata#mAnAq yatiqShTa | iqha tvaShTA# suqjani#mA suqratnO# dIqrGamAyu#H karatu jIqvasE# vaH || yathA&hA$nyanupUqrvam Bava#ntiq yathaqrtava# RuqtuBiqr-yanti# klRuqptAH | yathAq na pUrvaqmapa#rOq jahA$tyEqvA dhA#taqrAyU(gm)#Shi kalpayaiShAm || na hi# tE agnE taqnuvai$ krUqram caqkAraq martya#H | kaqpir-ba#Bastiq tEja#naqm puna#rjaqrAyuq gauri#va | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGamagnE# SuSuqddhyA raqyim | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam mRuqtyavEq svAhA$ || aqnaqDvAha#-maqnvAra#BAmahE svaqstayE$ | sa naq indra# iva dEqvEByOq vahni#H saqpAMra#NO Bava || 23 (10)

iqmE jIqvA vi#mRuqtairAva#var-tiqnnaBU$d-BaqdrA dEqvahU#tim nO aqdya | prA~jjO#&gAmA nRuqtayEq hasA#yaq drAGI#yaq Ayu#H prataqrAm dadhA#nAH || mRuqtyOH paqdam ~MyOpaya#ntOq yadaimaq drAGI#yaq Ayu#H prataqrAm dadhA#nAH | AqpyAya#mAnAH praqjayAq dhanE#na SuqddhAH pUqtA Ba#vatha yaj~jiyAsaH || iqmam jIqvEBya#H pariqdhim da#dhAmiq mA nO nu# gAqdapa#rOq arddha#mEqtam | Saqtam jI#vantu Saqrada#H purUqcIstiqrO mRuqtyum da#dmahEq parva#tEna || iqmA nArI#ravidhaqvAH suqpatnIqrA~jja#nEna saqrpiShAq saMmRu#SantAm | aqnaqSravO# anamIqvAH suqSEvAq ArO#hantuq jana#yOq yOniqmagrE$ || yadA~jja#nam traikakuqdam jAqta(gm) hiqmava#taqspari# | tEnAqmRuta#syaq mUlEqnArA#tIr-jamBayAmasi ( ) || yathAq tva-mu#dBiqnath-syO#ShadhE pRuthiqvyA adhi# | Eqvamiqma udBi#ndantu kIqrtyA yaSa#sA brahmavarcaqsEna# || aqjO$&syajAqsmadaqGA dvEShA(gm)#si yaqvO#&si yaqvayAqsmadaqGA dvEShA(gm)#si || 24 (13)
anuvAkam - 11

apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGamagnE# SuSuqddhyA raqyim | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || suqkShEqtriqyA su#gAtuqyA va#sUqyA ca# yajAmahE | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || pra yad-Bandi#ShTha EShAqm prAsmAkA#saSca sUqraya#H | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || prayadaqgnEH saha#svatO viqSvatOq yanti# sUqraya#H | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || prayattE# agnE sUqrayOq jAyE#mahiq pra tE# vaqyam | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || 25 (10)

tva(gm) hi vi#SvatOmuKa viqSvata#H pariqBUrasi# | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || dviShO# nO viSvatOmuqKAti# nAqvEva# pAraya | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || sa naqH sindhu#miva nAqvayA&ti# par.ShA svaqstayE$ | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || Apa#H pravaqNAdi#va yaqtI-rapAqsmath-sya#ndatAmaqGam | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || uqdvaqnA-du#daqkAnIqvApAqsmath-sya#ndatAmaqGam | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam ( ) || AqnaqndAya# pramOqdAyaq punaqrAgAq(gg)q svAngRuqhAn | apa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || na vai tatraq pramI#yatEq gauraSvaqH puru#ShaH paqSuH | yatrEqdam brahma# kriqyatE# pariqdhirjIva#nAyaq kamapa# naqH SOSu#cadaqGam || 26 (14)
anuvAkam - 12

apa#SyAma yuvaqti-mAqcara#ntIm mRuqtAya# jIqvAm pa#riNIqyamA#nAm | aqndhEnaq yA tama#sAq prAvRu#tA&siq prAcIqmavA#cIq-mavaqyan-nari#ShTyai || mayaiqtAm mAq(gg)qstAm BriqyamA#NA dEqvI saqtI pi#tRulOqkam ~MyadaiShi# | viqSvavA#rAq naBa#sAq sam~Mvya#yantyuqBau nO# lOqkau payaqsA&&vRu#NIhi || rayi#ShThAmaqgnim madhu#mantamUqrmiNaqmUrja#H santam tvAq payaqsOpaq sa(gm)sa#dEma | sa(gm) raqyyA samuq varca#sAq saca#svA naH svaqstayE$ || yE jIqvA yE ca# mRuqtA yE jAqtA yE caq jantyA$H | tEByO# GRuqtasya# dhArayituqm madhu#dhArA vyundaqtI || mAqtA ruqdrANA$m duhiqtA vasU#nAq(gg)q svasA#&&diqtyAnA#maq-mRuta#syaq nABi#H | praNuqvOca#m cikiqtuShEq janA#yaq mA gAmanA#gAqmadi#tim ~MvadhiShTa ( ) || piba#tUdaqkam tRuNA$nyattu | Omuth sRuqjata || 27 (12) Prapaataka Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to12 Anuvaakams :- (paqrEqyuqvA(gm)saqm pra viqdvAn Buva#nasyAqByAva# vRuthsvAq jO BAqgO#&yam ~Mvai catuScatvAri(gm)Sat | ya Eqtasyaq tvat pa~jca# | prakEqtunEqdantEq nAkE# supaqrNam ~Myau tEq yE yuddhya#ntEq tapaqsA&Sma#nvatI rEvatIqH sa(gm)ra#BaddhvamaqShTAvi(gm)#SatiH | yaM tEq yattaq uttiShThAqta# iqdantaq utti#ShThaq prEhyaSmaqnq. yadvA udvaqyamaqyam pa~jca#vi(gm)SatiH | AyA#tu triq(gm)qSat | vaiqSvAqnaqrE tasmi#n draqPsa iqmamapEqtAhO#Bir yujyantAmaGniqyA a#ditE pAqram ~Mvaq A pyA#yasva saqptavi(gm)#SatiH | uttE# gRuhE&KAShi#tiqstEBya#H pRu#thiqvyA aqntari#kShasyaq dvAtri(gm)#Sat | aqpUqpavA#nasauq daSa# Saqta da#Sa | EqtAstE# tEq diSaqH sarvA# iqdamaSma#n vi(gm)SaqtiH | O#rOhata taqnuvai$ krUqram caqkAraq puna#rmRuqtyavEq mA nO nu# gAd dadmaha iqmA nArIqH pariq trayO#vi(gm)SatiH | apa# naH sukShEtriqyA pra yadBan di#ShThaqH pra yadaqgnEH pra yattE# agnEq tva(gm) hi dviShaqH sa naqH sindhuqmApa#H pravaqNAdu#d vaqnAdA#naqndAyaq na vai tatraq yatrEqdam catu#rvi(gm)SatiqH | apa#SyAqmAvRu#NIhiq dvAda#Sa dvAdaSa |) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 Series of Dasinis :- (paqrEqyuqvA(gm)saq - mAyA$ - tvEqtAstE# saqptavi(gm)#SatiH ) First and Last Padam in TA, 4th Prapaatakam :- (paqrEqyuqvA(gm)saq - mOmuthsRuqjata ) || hari#H Om || || kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya brAhmaNE AraNyakE caturthaH prapAThakaH samAptaH || ================== Appendix (of Expansions)

- aSma#nvatI rEvatIqr{36}" "yadvai dEqvasya# saviqtuH paqvitraqm{37}" "~MyA rAqShTrAt paqnnA{38}" "dudvaqyam tama#saqspari#{39}" "dhAqtA pu#nAtu{40}" aSma#nvatI rEvatIqH sa(gm) ra#Baddhvaq mutti#ShThataq prata#ratA saKAyaH | atrA# jahAmaq yE asaqnnaSE#vAH SiqvAn vaqyamaqBi vAjAqnutta#rEma || {36}
(Appearing in T.A.4.3.2) yadvai dEqvasya# saviqtuH paqvitra(gm)# saqhasra#dhAraqm ~Mvita#tamaqntari#kShE | yEnApu#nAqdindraqmanA#rtaq-mArtyaiq tEnAqham mA(gm) saqrvata#num punAmi || {37}
(Appearing in T.A.4.3.3)

yA rAqShTrAt paqnnAdapaq yantiq SAKA# aqBimRu#tA nRuqpati#miqcCamA#nAH | dhAqtustAH sarvAqH pava#nEna pUqtAH praqjayAq&smAn-raqyyA varca#sAq sa(gm)sRu#jAtha || {38} (Appearing in T.A.4.3.3) udvaqyam tama#saqspariq paSya#ntOq jyOtiqrutta#ram | dEqvam dE#vaqtrA sUryaqmaga#nmaq jyOti#ruttaqmam || {39}
(Appearing in T.A.4.3.3) dhAqtA pu#nAtu saviqtA pu#nAtu | aqgnEstEja#sAq sUrya#syaq varca#sA || {40}

- "A pyA#yasvaq{41}" "sam tE${42}" A pyA#yasvaq same#tu tE viqSvata#H sOmaq vRuShNi#yaM | BavAq vAja#sya sa~ggaqthE || {41} saM tEq payA(gm)#siq samu# yantuq vAjAqH saM ~MvRuShNi#yA-nyaBimAtiqShAha#H | AqpyAya#mAnO aqmRutA#ya sOma diqvi SravA(gg)#syuttaqmAni# dhiShva || {42} (Both {41} and {42} appearing in TS 4.2.7.4) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- "lOqkam pRu#Naq{43|" "tA a#syaq sUda#dOhasaH{44}" lOqkaM pRu#Na CiqdraM pRuqNAthO# sIda SiqvA tvaM | iqndrAqgnI tvAq bRuhaqspati#raqsmin yOnA#vasIShaqdann || {43} tA a#syaq sUda#dOhasaqH sOma(gg)# SrINantiq pRuSna#yaH | janma#n dEqvAnAqM ~MviSa#striqShvA rO#caqnE diqvaH || {44} (Both {43} and {44} appearing in TS 4.2.4.4) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- ""aSma#nvatI rEvatIqr{45}" "yadvai dEqvasya# saviqtuH paqvitraqm{46}" "~MyA rAqShTrAtpaqnnA{47}" "dudvaqyam tama#saqspari#{48}" dhAqtA pu#nAtu{49}" {45} is same as (36} above, {46} is same as (37} above {47} is same as (38} above. {48} is same as (39} above {49} is same as (40} above ================================
